title: The Good Husband
description: When Tom Kolman is found dead in his car, there is no evidence that points to unnatural causes. But as detectives begin to look into his inner circle, they uncover a love triangle that turns the tragedy into a tangled mystery. Andrea Canning reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
